Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Azotemia was the major side effect recognized , and it occurred in 11 % of episodes .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Azotemia |

Azotemia is a condition characterized by an excess of nitrogenous waste products, particularly urea and creatinine, in the blood. It is not a chemical compound itself, but rather a clinical condition. However, since the paragraph mentions "Azotemia was the major side effect," it can be considered the chemical entity in this context.

| Chemical |

| Azotemia |

Azotemia is a condition characterized by an excess of nitrogenous waste products, particularly urea and creatinine, in the blood. It is not a chemical compound itself, but rather a clinical condition related to the presence of excess chemicals in the body. However, since the paragraph mentions "Azotemia was the major side effect," it can be considered the chemical entity in this context, as it refers to the abnormal presence of certain chemicals (nitrogenous waste products) in the body.
